objects.src: <svg xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg' viewBox='0 0 1080 1080'><defs><linearGradient id='grad1' x1='0%' y1='0%' x2='100%' y2='100%'><stop offset='0%' style='stop-color:#1a1a1a;stop-opacity:1'/><stop offset='100%' style='stop-color:#333333;stop-opacity:1'/></linearGradient><linearGradient id='grad2' x1='0%' y1='0%' x2='100%' y2='0%'><stop offset='0%' style='stop-color:#ffffff;stop-opacity:0.1'/><stop offset='100%' style='stop-color:#ffffff;stop-opacity:0'/></linearGradient></defs><rect width='1080' height='1080' fill='url(#grad1)'/><rect x='40' y='40' width='1000' height='1000' rx='15' stroke='#555555' stroke-width='2' fill='none'/><rect x='60' y='60' width='960' height='960' rx='10' stroke='#777777' stroke-width='1' fill='none'/><path d='M-100 200 C150 150, 400 250, 600 200 C800 150, 1000 250, 1200 200 L1200 0 L-100 0 Z' fill='url(#grad2)' opacity='0.2'/><path d='M-100 880 C150 830, 400 930, 600 880 C800 830, 1000 930, 1200 880 L1200 1080 L-100 1080 Z' fill='url(#grad2)' opacity='0.2'/><circle cx='540' cy='540' r='400' fill='#ffffff' opacity='0.03'/><circle cx='540' cy='540' r='300' fill='#ffffff' opacity='0.05'/><polygon points='540,150 600,300 480,300' fill='#ffffff' opacity='0.1'/></svg>

objects.text:
• Iconic star chevron logo design
• Classic high-top & sporty low-top sneakers
• Durable backpack with spacious compartment
• Premium quality canvas materials

product_details.name: Converse Ultimate Style Pack - Classic Backpack & Sneaker Combo
product_details.description:
• Sleek black Converse backpack with iconic star chevron logo
• Classic high-top Chuck Taylor All-Star sneaker in timeless black canvas
• Sporty white and grey low-top sneakers for versatile style
• Durable backpack with spacious main compartment and front zip pocket
• Signature white rubber toe cap and sole on high-top sneakers
• Comfortable cushioned insoles in both shoe styles
• Premium quality canvas material for long-lasting wear
• Authentic Converse branding and design elements
• Perfect combination for school, sports, or casual everyday use
• Versatile black and white color scheme matches any outfit

banner_details:
This banner features a bold and modern retail advertisement layout showcasing a backpack and sneaker combo. The background utilizes a dark gradient (#1a1a1a to #333333), enhanced with smooth abstract curves and concentric circular overlays in subtle white opacities to add depth. The top section includes a prominent bold heading ("heading") followed by a sleek, futuristic subheading ("subheading") and a clean, light tagline ("tagline"). A bullet-style product features list ("description") sits to the left of the product display. The bottom portion emphasizes pricing in large typography ("price"), paired with a clean white call-to-action button ("cta_button" and "cta"). The product image ("product_image") includes a black backpack and two sneaker styles, positioned at an angle for dynamic visual balance.

**Color Palette:**
- Charcoal Black: #1a1a1a
- Slate Gray: #333333
- White: #ffffff
- Cool Gray: #cccccc
- Light Stroke Gray: #777777
- Button Border Gray: #555555
- CTA Text Black: #000000
product_color: The product image showcases a stylish Converse set with a black backpack, black high-top sneakers, and white-gray low-top sneakers. The dominant color is deep black (#000000), giving the banner a bold, modern look, while crisp white (#FFFFFF) highlights brand logos and shoe soles, adding contrast. The light gray (#B0B0B0) and charcoal gray (#4A4A4A) on the low-tops create a layered depth through subtle blending. The off-white/beige midsole (#F5F5DC) in the high-tops adds a vintage touch. These colors are strategically blended yet individually highlighted using bold outlines and iconic branding, perfect for a sleek, urban-themed advertisement banner.
